TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Here you can invite friends for social betting.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Simply create a BET either from the list of social topics available from us or create your own topic.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Invite your friends and family to accept the BetTo Challenge. That's it.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
ALERT_SIGNUP_SUCCESS_MSG: Please check your email and verify your account.
SERVER_ERROR_201: Duplicate Email Address Detected. Please use different email address.
SERVER_ERROR_202: Email Address not found in Database.
SERVER_ERROR_204: Your login has failed. Please supply correct credentials.
SERVER_ERROR_206: Supplied user status is new. Please activate the user account via Activation Email.
SERVER_ERROR_207: Some problem occured while detecting the account status. Please contact system administrator.
SERVER_ERROR_209: Connection to Database has failed. Please try again later.
SERVER_ERROR_210: Mandatory params are missing in request.
